preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 126.48 g of lead. 
 2. Weigh out 70.00 g of samarium. 
 3. Weigh out 204.38 g of thallium. 
 4. In a suitable furnace, combine the weighed materials in a crucible made of silica or graphite. 
 5. Stir the mixture thoroughly to ensure an even blend of the metals.
